#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
        char s[1005];
        scanf("%s", s);
        int k;
        scanf("%d", &k);
        int mod = 0;
        for (int i = 0; s[i]; i++) {
            mod *= 10;
            mod += s[i]-'0';
            mod %= k;
        }
        if (mod == 0) {
            printf("YES\n");
        } else {
            printf("NO\n");
        }
    }

}
